title:  "주사위 굴리기"
excerpt: "백준 java"

---
```java

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);

		int N = sc.nextInt();
		int M = sc.nextInt();
		int r = sc.nextInt();
		int c = sc.nextInt();
		int K = sc.nextInt();

		int[][] arr = new int[N][M];

		for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
			for (int j = 0; j < M; j++) {
				arr[i][j] = sc.nextInt();
			}
		}

		int[] dice = new int[6];

		for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
			int order = sc.nextInt();

			if (order == 4) {
				if (r + 1 < N) {
					r++;
					int tmp = dice[0];
					dice[0] = dice[3];
					dice[3] = dice[1];
					dice[1] = dice[2];
					dice[2] = tmp;
				} else
					continue;
			}
			if (order == 3) {
				if (r - 1 >= 0) {
					r--;
					int tmp = dice[0];
					dice[0] = dice[2];
					dice[2] = dice[1];
					dice[1] = dice[3];
					dice[3] = tmp;
				} else
					continue;
			}
			if (order == 2) {
				if (c - 1 >= 0) {
					c--;
					int tmp = dice[0];
					dice[0] = dice[4];
					dice[4] = dice[1];
					dice[1] = dice[5];
					dice[5] = tmp;
				} else
					continue;
			}
			if (order == 1) {
				if (c + 1 < M) {
					c++;
					int tmp = dice[0];
					dice[0] = dice[5];
					dice[5] = dice[1];
					dice[1] = dice[4];
					dice[4] = tmp;
				} else
					continue;
			}

			if (arr[r][c] == 0)
				arr[r][c] = dice[1];
			else {
				dice[1] = arr[r][c];
				arr[r][c] = 0;
			}
			System.out.println(dice[0]);
			
		}

	}

}
```
